title: Any item cannot be selected at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select any item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.

Expected Behavior: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selected item should maintain focus and be highlighted as the active selection.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Select any item in the view.
3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of maintaining focus on the selected item.
